title: Tomboy Banzai
alternative_title: Otenba Banzai ; おてんばバンザイ
status: Otenba Banzai ; おてんばバンザイ
description:
Description :
        (from ebookjapan):What's the matter with being kidnapped!? Girls are strong! In addition to the title story "Tomboy Banzai," "Ga-tunk Classroom" depicts a no-good art teacher who boldly challenges what she wants to do when she is told that she has only one month to live. Manga School" and "MY Friend," in which Mr. Ishimori teaches how to draw manga. In Ishimori-style, "Won't You Come to the Swan Lake Together?" "Azukin-chan" and "Shin Masterpiece Fairy Tale Akazukin-chan". It contains a total of 13 stories, including the horror manga "The Silver Eyes".*Note: CDJapan link only for MY Friend, which is bundled with other Ishinomori shojo oneshots from different one-shot compilations.*

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 11: First Love, Ah, First Love, First Love!
Vol.1 Chapter 8: The Modern Girl's Mentality
